articles.content: Indian batter Prithvi Shaw has been ruled out of the remainder of his stint with Northamptonshire after sustaining an injury during the One Day Cup match against Durham.Prithvi injured his knee while… [+1957 chars]

articles.title: Hardik's WC role in jeopardy as BCCI's Bumrah stance for Ireland T20Is disclosed - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Both Bumrah and Hardik will only know their fate on Monday morning when the Ajit Agarkar-led selection committee will reveal India's Asia Cup squad | Cricket
